name: Adventures of Bertram Fiddle: Episode 2: A Bleaker Predicklement
description: A Bleaker Predicklement is a hilarious AND mysterious point and click adventure game. Explore smoggy alleys, meet suspicious characters and help Bertram as he finds himself framed for a murdering he did not commit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 2 GB available space
